item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hey there! I’ve created this blog to share the knowledge I’ve acquired over the years. This is a blog that focuses on sharing the solutions…
item.content:encoded: Hey there! I’ve created this blog to share the knowledge I’ve acquired over the years. This is a blog that focuses on sharing the solutions for the problems you encounter in your daily life of software development.

item.title: Custom Logging in Spring Boot
item.description: Logging is an important feature of software development. If implemented properly logs reveal a lot of information about the application. In…
item.content:encoded: Logging is an important feature of software development. If implemented properly logs reveal a lot of information about the application. In this blog, we’ll look at how we can create our own custom pattern for logging in a Spring Boot application. We’ll also look at something known as MDC(Mapping Diagnostic Context) to log contextual information
